name: Words and Pictures Creative Service
tag_list: branding, brand-development, marketing-strategy, media-planning-and-placement, advertising, art-direction, print-design, graphic-design, corporate-identity, online-media-design, website-design, e-blast, web-banners
overview:
Words and Pictures is a brand development and advertising firm specializing in digital media and non traditional media vehicles.

They help companies build their brand through website development and site optimization, banner ads, e-blast campaigns, social networking and fan based sites, PURLs and various targeted digital campaigns delivering high click through rates and measurable ROI.

Words and Picturesâ€™ clients benefit from the company’s over 22 years in business and years-plus experience. Founded in 1987 by two Madison Avenue veterans, Words and Pictures is well versed in traditional print advertising, having won numerous regional and national awards for creativity and effectiveness in ad campaigns, direct mail and brand/logo development.

Having evolved to a fully digital agency, they now apply their creative talents and targeted communications to the vast array of digital media available to their client base.

Their diverse client list ranges from nichÃ© companies to Fortune 500 corporations in industries such as software and computer technology, electronics, healthcare, food and beverage, social services and educational institutions. Their extensive expertise includes consumer as well as B to B marketing in all venues.
